wikipedia_page.main: Rt Hon. Sir Daniel Ford Goddard PC JP (17 January 1850 – 6 May 1922) was a British civil engineer, businessman and Liberal Party politician who served as a Member of Parliament (MP) for Ipswich from 1895 to 1918. He was also Mayor of Ipswich from 1891 to 1892.

response: *Sir Daniel Ford Goddard, civil engineer, businessman and Liberal MP 1895–1918

response: Ebenezer married Annie Ford, daughter of Thomas Ford. His son Daniel Ford Goddard succeeded him as Secretary and Engineer of the Ipswich Gas Company and pursued a successful career as a politician.
